alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 6:10AM PST until January 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wintry mix of rain and freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Plain, Stevens Pass, Holden Village, Stehekin, and Leavenworth. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slick conditions on untreated roads and surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
